<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 584 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This weapon is empowered with freezing ice. It deals an additional 1d6 cold damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, the target is also slowed 1 until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a DC 24 Fortitude save.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Frost
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 584 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Frost (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 584 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The save DC is 34. Cold damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target’s cold resistance.
name: Frost (Greater)
